√chid 'cut off'

present: [7.] chinátti  chindánti etc. V.+   -- chindeta  achinam  

perfect: cicheda  cichide etc. B.+  

aorist: [1.] chedma  chidyāt  áchedi   -- [2.] achidat etc. AV.+   -- [3.] acichidas   -- [4.] achaitsīt etc. B.+  chetsīt etc.  chitsi etc. AV.+  chetsi etc.  

future: [1.] chetsyati  chetsyate etc. B.+  achetsyat   -- [2.] chettā  

verbal: chinná V.+  chettum B.+  chetttavaí  chittvā́ B.+  -chídya AV.+  

secondary: passive: chidyáte etc. V.+  chidyati etc.   -- intensive: cechid-   -- desiderative: cichitsati  cichitsate   -- causative: chedayati etc. S.+  

derivatives: -chid V.+  chidā C.  chidura C.  -chitti B.+  chidrá V.+  cheda AV.+  -chedaka C.  -chedin E.+  chedya E.+  chedana B.+  chedanīya C.  chettavya E.+  chettṛ B.+  cichitsu E.
